message: Let's split it evenly, Bob.  Fair is fair!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob, but let's be reasonable. I'm losing money with each round, and I'm sure you wouldn't want to push me to the brink.
Don't try to guilt trip me, Alice. I know the money is worth less to you now. Time to make a deal!
Okay, Bob, you're right. I can't keep rejecting your offers. Let's make this deal. I'm taking a loss, but at least we'll get something.
